name: Arcades Sabboth
oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Arcades Sabboth unless you pay {G}{W}{U}.
Each untapped creature you control gets +0/+2 as long as it's not attacking.
{W}: Arcades Sabboth gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

name: Aquamoeba
oracle_text: Discard a card: Switch Aquamoeba's power and toughness until end of turn.

name: Absorb
oracle_text: Counter target spell. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: "It's a shame to see such potential wasted on petty evil. Let's correct that, shall we?"

name: Absorb
oracle_text: Counter target spell. You gain 3 life.

name: Absorb
oracle_text: Counter target spell. You gain 3 life.

name: Lotleth Giant
oracle_text: Undergrowth — When Lotleth Giant enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target opponent for each creature card in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"I prefer the big and looming to the small and skittering."
@-Cevraya, Golgari shaman

name: Lord of the Accursed
oracle_text:
Other Zombies you control get +1/+1.
{1}{B}, {T}: All Zombies gain menace until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Curse of Wandering leaves only hatred.

name: Loaming Shaman
oracle_text: When Loaming Shaman enters the battlefield, target player shuffles any number of target cards from their graveyard into their library.
flavor_text:
"The living don't ever stay living, and the dead don't always stay dead."
@-Jeddeg, philosopher of graves

name: Liliana, Untouched by Death
oracle_text:
+1: Mill three cards. If at least one Zombie card is milled this way, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
−2: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Zombies you control.
−3: You may cast Zombie spells from your graveyard this turn.

name: Liliana's Standard Bearer
oracle_text:
Flash
When Liliana's Standard Bearer enters the battlefield, draw X cards, where X is the number of creatures that died under your control this turn.
flavor_text: The purple banner of the House of Vess is a symbol of death wherever it's flown.

name: Liliana's Mastery
oracle_text:
Zombies you control get +1/+1.
When Liliana's Mastery enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
flavor_text: "There are so many of them. It seems they've just been waiting for someone to serve."

name: Liliana's Devotee
oracle_text:
Zombies you control get +1/+0.
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor_text: Liliana inspires horror in many and fanatical admiration in a few.

name: Lightning Greaves
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {0}
flavor_text: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.

name: Leafkin Druid
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}. If you control four or more creatures, add {G}{G} instead.
flavor_text: "I am rooted in the life of all that thrives around me. You cannot move me."

name: Lazotep Reaver
oracle_text: When Lazotep Reaver enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text: Despite their many forms, the Eternals worked in chilling harmony, unburdened by instinct or emotion.

name: Lazotep Plating
oracle_text:
Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
You and permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (You and they can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

name: Laboratory Drudge
oracle_text: At the beginning of each end step, draw a card if you've cast a spell from a graveyard or activated an ability of a card in a graveyard this turn.
flavor_text:
"Many hands make light work."
@-Ludevic, necro-alchemist

name: Kazuul, Tyrant of the Cliffs
oracle_text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, if you're the defending player, create a 3/3 red Ogre creature token unless that creature's controller pays {3}.
flavor_text: Warning to those who scale the cliffs without paying tribute: it's a long way down.

name: Kazandu Refuge
oracle_text:
Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.
When Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

name: Karametra's Favor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Karametra's Favor enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
flavor_text: The harvest god's cornucopia contains the fruits of the fields, the forest, and beyond.

name: Kangee's Lieutenant
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Kangee's Lieutenant attacks, attacking creatures with flying get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Encore {5}{W} ({5}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

name: Kangee, Sky Warden
oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance
Whenever Kangee, Sky Warden attacks, attacking creatures with flying get +2/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever Kangee blocks, blocking creatures with flying get +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Let their horrors and machines come. We will meet them blow for blow."

name: Kaervek the Merciless
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, Kaervek the Merciless deals damage equal to that spell's mana value to any target.
flavor_text:
"Rats and jackals feast in his swath, but even they will not walk with him."
@-Mangara

name: Jwar Isle Refuge
oracle_text:
Jwar Isle Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.
When Jwar Isle Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

name: Jubilant Skybonder
oracle_text:
Flying
Creatures you control with flying have "Spells your opponents cast that target this creature cost {2} more to cast."
flavor_text: She was born unable to walk. Through the eludha, she was able to fly.

name: Josu Vess, Lich Knight
oracle_text:
Kicker {5}{B} (You may pay an additional {5}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Menace
When Josu Vess, Lich Knight enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create eight 2/2 black Zombie Knight creature tokens with menace.

name: Jaspera Sentinel
oracle_text:
Reach
{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: The arrows of the elvish elite strike as true and deadly as the fangs of the Cosmos Serpent they revere.

name: Jade Mage
oracle_text: {2}{G}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text:
"We are one with the wild things. Life blooms from our fingertips and nature responds to our summons."
@-Jade creed

name: Inspired Sphinx
oracle_text:
Flying
When Inspired Sphinx enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to the number of opponents you have.
{3}{U}: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

name: Indulgent Tormentor
oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card unless target opponent sacrifices a creature or pays 3 life.
flavor_text: The promise of anguish is payment enough for services rendered.

name: Idol of Oblivion
oracle_text:
{T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you created a token this turn.
{8}, {T}, Sacrifice Idol of Oblivion: Create a 10/10 colorless Eldrazi creature token.
flavor_text: "Arise, great one, and cleanse the world of our enemies!"

name: Hunter's Prowess
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards."
flavor_text: To be counted among the warriors of Setessa's Leina Tower, you must not fear death, only failure.

name: Hunter's Insight
oracle_text: Choose target creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker this turn, draw that many cards.
flavor_text:
"The predator knows the true way of the world. Life is conflict. Only the strong survive."
@-Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Hour of Reckoning
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Destroy all nontoken creatures.
flavor_text: Those who are chosen do not doubt. Those who remain do not lament.

name: Hornet Queen
oracle_text:
Flying
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
When Hornet Queen enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with flying and deathtouch.

name: Hornet Nest
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Hornet Nest is dealt damage, create that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with flying and deathtouch. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

name: Holdout Settlement
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}. ({C} represents colorless mana.)
{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: Even in areas of profound devastation, the hedrons remained intact.

name: Hoard-Smelter Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
{3}{R}: Destroy target artifact. Hoard-Smelter Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that artifact's mana value.
flavor_text: He collects the precious metals, and then converts the rest to propellant.

name: Heraldic Banner
oracle_text:
As Heraldic Banner enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+0.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

name: Hedron Archive
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}{C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Hedron Archive: Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"You've begun to understand the hedrons' true purpose," said Ugin. "The Eldrazi can be imprisoned."
"And how did that work out last time?" asked Jace.

name: Haven of the Spirit Dragon
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a Dragon creature spell.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Haven of the Spirit Dragon: Return target Dragon creature card or Ugin planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Havengul Lich
oracle_text: {1}: You may cast target creature card in a graveyard this turn. When you cast it this turn, Havengul Lich gains all activated abilities of that card until end of turn.
flavor_text: Fusing intelligence with the power of undeath requires inspiration of the darkest kind.

name: Hate Mirage
oracle_text: Choose up to two target creatures you don't control. For each of those creatures, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: A trick of the light, though momentary, can still be deadly.

name: Harvest Season
oracle_text: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the number of tapped creatures you control, put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: A true reflection of nature: death fostering life.

name: Harmonize
oracle_text: Draw three cards.
flavor_text:
"Animals commune with their environment without the need for language. Theirs is a fundamental connection that surpasses flimsy words."
@-Vivien Reid

name: Harbinger of the Hunt
oracle_text:
Flying
{2}{R}: Harbinger of the Hunt deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
{2}{G}: Harbinger of the Hunt deals 1 damage to each other creature with flying.
flavor_text: An Atarka dragon's exhale cooks what its inhale consumes.
